author: Jessica Estepa
description: First lady Melania Trump is accompanying President Trump on his first foreign trip as commander-in-chief.
title: Melania Trump appears to swat the president's hand away

author: HuffPost Video
description: Melania Trump has a really hard time holding her husband’s hand. Don’t believe it? Here’s the proof.
title: Melania Trump Hates Holding Donald's Hand

author: Claire Zillman
description: Unlike other first ladies, Melania Trump isn't afraid to wear a frown in public.
title: The Subtle Power of Melania Trump’s Poker Face

author: Joel B. Pollak
description: First Lady Melania Trump has won rave reviews as she accompanies President Donald Trump on his first foreign trip.
title: Melania Trump: Breakout Star of Trump's First Foreign Trip - Breitbart

author: Allie Malloy, Sara Murray and Jeremy Diamond, CNN
description: Melania Trump has dutifully considered every outfit she has worn during her first trip abroad as first lady -- her visit with Pope Francis on Wednesday was no exception.
title: Melania Trump wears veil, but not a headscarf

author: Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D.
description: After Melania Trump met with Pope Francis in the Vatican Wednesday, her spokeswoman confirmed that the First Lady is indeed a Roman Catholic.
title: Melania Trump Is First Catholic to Live in White House Since JFK

author: Ginger Adams Otis
description: Melania Trump was in no mood to play along for the cameras when her husband reached for her hand as they arrived in Israel.
title: SEE IT: Melania slaps away President Trump’s hand in Israel

author: https://www.facebook.com/chrisriotta/
description: Melania Trump's quick flick of the wrist may be her most candid move to date as first lady.
title: Melania Trump smacks away the president's hand at an Israeli airport

author: Penny Starr
description: Melania Trump smiles at passersby on a highway in Sevnica, Solvenia that reads “Welcome to the Hometown of First Lady”.
title: First Lady Melania Trump Boosts Tourism in Her Home Country

author: http://xml.zeit.de/autoren/H/Rieke_Havertz/index
description: Melania Trump tut sich schwer als First Lady. Sie wohnt noch nicht im Weißen Haus und ist selten an der Seite ihres Mannes zu sehen. Dabei könnte ihre Rolle mächtig sein.
title: Melania Trump: Im Schatten
